statements: UPDATE network_performance_monitoring SET network_status = 'Good' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE network_performance_monitoring SET network_status = 'Excellent' WHERE network_device = 'Router';
UPDATE network_performance_monitoring SET network_status = 'Poor' WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
UPDATE network_performance_monitoring SET network_status = 'offline' WHERE network_device = 'router1';
UPDATE network_performance_monitoring SET network_status = 'online' WHERE network_device = 'switch2';
UPDATE network_performance_monitoring SET network_status = 'degraded' WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01';
UPDATE network_devices SET device_name='Router 1' WHERE device_id=1;
UPDATE network_devices SET device_status=true WHERE device_ip='192.168.1.100';
UPDATE network_alerts SET alert_description='High CPU usage' WHERE alert_type='CPU';
UPDATE network_devices SET device_name = 'Updated Device 1' WHERE device_id = 1;
UPDATE network_devices SET device_status = FALSE WHERE device_ip = '192.168.1.100';
UPDATE network_alerts SET alert_description = 'New Description' WHERE alert_type = 'High Priority';
UPDATE network_devices SET location='Server Room' WHERE device_id = 1;
UPDATE network_metrics SET status_code=200 WHERE metric_id = 10;
UPDATE network_alerts SET alert_message='High Latency Alert' WHERE alert_id = 5;
UPDATE network_devices SET location = 'Server Room' WHERE device_id = 1;
UPDATE network_metrics SET packet_loss = 0.05 WHERE device_id = 1 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01';
UPDATE network_alerts SET alert_message = 'Critical Alert: High Latency' WHERE device_id = 2 AND TIMESTAMP > '2022-01-15' AND status_code = 503;
UPDATE network_devices SET location = 'Server Room' WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE network_traffic SET traffic_amount = 2000 WHERE traffic_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE network_events SET event_description = 'Critical Event Detected' WHERE event_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002';
UPDATE network_devices SET location = 'Server Room' WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE network_traffic SET traffic_amount = 500 WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' AND traffic_type = 'Incoming';
UPDATE network_alerts SET alert_message = 'High traffic detected' WHERE event_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002' AND alert_type = 'Traffic';
UPDATE network_devices SET location = 'Server Room' WHERE device_name = 'Server001';
UPDATE network_traffic SET data_usage = 500 WHERE traffic_id = '8a3c0756-fbc2-432e-be20-e7d640248bee';
UPDATE network_alerts SET alert_message = 'High traffic detected' WHERE alert_id = '1a1aa66e-5820-4bff-ae65-f5cad805d735';
UPDATE network_devices SET location = 'Data Center' WHERE device_name = 'Router1';
UPDATE network_traffic SET data_usage = data_usage + 100 WHERE device_id = (SELECT device_id FROM network_devices WHERE device_name = 'Switch1');
UPDATE network_users SET role = 'Admin' WHERE email = 'admin@example.com';
